channel.title: East End Hotel on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in East End Hotel on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Madikeri and around
item.description: (….Continued…) Next day we woke up leisurely had a wonderful breakfast . Our host meticulously wrote down all the attractions near Madikeri. The list included Tala-Cauvery â€“ birth place of river Kaveri, Raja seat, Abby Falls, Omkareshwara Temple, Cauvery- Nisargadhama. We decided for all except the last one as we wanted to take it easy and not rushing between attractions. As soon as we started driving to Madikeri (district headquarters of Coorg) the real beauty of Coorg started to unveil itself.
